sentences.en: Apples abound here all the year round.
sentences.cn: 这里一年到头都有很多苹果.

sentences.en: But problems abound in the management of State - owned companies.
sentences.cn: 但是在 国有 企业的管理中仍然存在不少问题.
在现代的文章中这类例子不胜枚举.

sentences.en: Examples of this abound in her book.
sentences.cn: 这样的例子在她书中比比皆是。

sentences.en: Finally, offer this closing prayer to the Lord: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that you may abound in hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
sentences.cn: 最后，将结束的祷告告诉主：愿在你拥有信仰的时候希望的上帝用快乐与和平充满你的人生，让你在圣灵的力量下富于希望。

sentences.en: I will laugh at goodness and it will thrive and abound.
sentences.cn: 我笑善良,它们发扬光大.

sentences.en: Most of her poems abound in imagery.
sentences.cn: 她的诗歌大多数富于形象.

sentences.en: Oranges abound here all the year round.
sentences.cn: 这里一年到头都有很多橙子.

sentences.en: Poems and essays alike abound in neat turns of phrase, and epigrams that are immediately pleasing.
sentences.cn: 诗文中充满了简洁的短语和读来清晰可喜的短句.

sentences.en: Products abound and the people are happy.
Questions abound as to the reasons for the president's decision.
sentences.cn: 关于总裁作出这一决定的理由,人们提出了各种各样的疑问.

sentences.en: Rich resources and hidden wealth abound in these areas.
sentences.cn: 那里物产丰富,有很多宝贝.

sentences.en: Rumors of such coordination abound, but as with many rumors, they have no basis in fact.
sentences.cn: 关于这类协调的谣传很多；但如同许多其他谣传一样，它们没有事实根据。

sentences.en: Rumours abound as to the reasons for his resignation.
sentences.cn: 有关他辞职的原因有各种各样的谣传。

sentences.en: Stories abound about when he was in charge.
sentences.cn: 关于他在任时的传闻多不胜数。
有关他游历的故事多得很。

sentences.en: Tales of greed and fraud during the boom years abound.
sentences.cn: 贪婪与诈骗例子在繁荣时期数不胜数.

sentences.en: Wherever true valour is found , true modesty will there abound.
sentences.cn: 真正的勇敢,都饱含谦虚.

sentences.en: Wherever valour true is found , true modesty will there abound . ( W . S . Gilbert )
sentences.cn: 真正的勇敢, 都包含谦虚. ( 吉尔伯特 )

trans.tran_cn: 多, 大量存在, 富于, 充满
trans.tran_en: to exist in very large numbers

trans.tran_cn: 丰富，盛产，非常多，大量存在，充满
trans.tran_en: If things abound, or if a place abounds with things, there are very large numbers of them
